name: Vimlark's HammerEdge: Legend of Mustache
description:
Vimlark is an adventurer who is unlucky when it comes to love,  One morning he found all the answer, but will you be able to full fill it?

Controls:

Arrow Keys for Movement / Z for Dash / X for Attack / C for Jump

How the theme used:

The only way you can hit the enemy is to distance yourself  to the enemy, within just the rang of the EDGE of your hammer, also you can push out the enemy at the EDGE of the platform to win the game.

How the Requirements used:

I used the the traditional boss in the game, where you need to beat the crap out of them to win the game.

Additional Note:

  1. there is no exit button at the end
  2. the game isn't fit to the screen properly
  3. there are still some bugs about the win system
